name: School of Abjuration
description: The School of Abjuration emphasizes magic that blocks, banishes, or protects. Abjurers are masters of defensive magic.

2.name: Abjuration Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an abjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Arcane Ward
2.description: You can weave a protective ward around yourself that absorbs damage whenever you cast an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

6.name: Projected Ward
6.description: When a creature you can see within 30 feet takes damage, you can use your reaction to cause your Arcane Ward to absorb that damage.

10.name: Improved Abjuration
10.description: When you cast an abjuration spell that requires you to make an ability check as part of casting the spell, add your proficiency bonus to that check.

14.name: Spell Resistance
14.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells, and resistance to the damage of spells.
